title: Loving Hut - Puncak
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Juice bar, Asian, Indonesian
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Serving all vegan food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages, and vegan desserts.
streetAddress: Kantor Pemasaran Kota Bunga Little Venice Puncak, Jawa Barat, Puncak
